SoftwareFeature.comment_SoftwareFeatures: //Software feature contains controls to Enable/Disable POST, Cp Cpk Report, Analytics, Data Logging and control to set value for Maximum Digital Zoom//

SystemParameters.comment_Sensor: //Sensor section contains Name, Unique Id, Controller IO number and Triggering Edge of each sensor//
SystemParameters.comment_Light: //Light section contains Name, Unique Id, Type (Can be Bright field, Dark field, Back light, Front light, Diffuse light, Co-Axial diffuse etc.), Controller IO number and Level (HIGH or LOW) of each Light//
SystemParameters.comment_Camera: //Camera section contains Camera Id, Type (Top, Side or Front), Model, Area of Interest (AOI), Trigger Mode, Controller IO Number, Triggering Edge, Pulse Width, Exposure Time in micro seconds, Interface Type (Allowed values are USB3, GigE, USB2), Gain in dB, Calibration details (Date and file path) of each camera//

PartParameters.comment_PartParameters: //Parts Parameters section includes Number of Parts configured and Parts List. Part List contains Name, Parallel Trigger Threads, Number of measurements and Measurement details//

PartsList.Name: ECU1511
PartsList.comment_ParallelTriggerThreads: //ParallelTriggerThreads contain Thread Name, Thread Id and Imaging Views. Combination of Camera and Light(s) is defined in Imaging View along with Sensor to Light Delay (in micro seconds), Light to Camera Trigger Delay, Light Pulse Width and Reference Co-ordinate system. Each Imaging View is given a Name and unique ImageId. Camera and Light(s) are accessed by their unique Ids.//

ReferenceCoordSystem.comment_RefROI: //Reference ROI is cluster of Left, Top, Right, Bottom and Rotation values//
ReferenceCoordSystem.Name: FirstReference

ReferenceCoordSystem.Name: FirstReference

PartsList.comment_Measurements: //Measurements section contains Name, Type, Enable, Algorithm Sequence, Calibration Co-efficients, User Correction Linearity Coefficients, User Correction Bias Coefficients, LSL, USL, LCL, UCL, Control Limits Violation Threshold, Specification Limits Violation Threshold, Overlay Options, Datalog Enable, Display Icon path for each Measurement//

Measurements.Name: CollarWidth
Measurements.comment_AlgorithmSequence: //Particular Measurement may require sequence of Algorithms. ThreadId and ThreadImageId are mentioned in each Algorithm which corresponds to particular combination of Camera and Light Ids. Result of each Algorithm is stored in a variable and final result is calculated using Math Expression defined.//

LocalRef.comment_LocalRefROI: //Local Reference ROI is cluster of Left, Top, Right, Bottom and Rotation values//
LocalRef.Name: CollarWidthLocalReference

AlgorithmSequence.comment_Overlay: //OverlayOptions contain Text, Co ordinates, Angle in Degrees, Text Size and Text Color for Overlay//
//OverlayOptions contain Text, Co ordinates, Angle in Degrees, Text Size and Text Color for Overlay//

Measurements.comment_ControlLimitsViolationThreshold: //If 3 measurement results out of 1000, are crossing LCL and UCL then fail is detected//
Measurements.comment_SpecificationLimitsViolationThre: //If 5 measurement results out of 5000, are crossing LSL and USL then fail is detected//
Measurements.comment_Overlay: //OverlayOptions contain Text, Co ordinates, Angle in Degrees, Text Size and Text Color for Overlay//

AlgoParameters.comment_RefROIEdgeOptions: Reference ROI Edge Options is cluster of Edge Polarity, Kernel Size, Width, Minimum Edge Strength, Interpolation Type and Data Processing Method
AlgoParameters.comment_RefROILineOptions: Reference ROI Line Options is cluster of Number of lines, Type, Min. score, Max Score Orientation, Angle Range, Angle Tolerance, Step size, Min. SNR(db), Min Points (%) and Hough Iterations
